definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: It was Britain's presence in Egypt that led to the brotherhood's creation.
sentences.chinese: 正是西方国家在埃及的跋扈导致了兄弟会的成立。

sentences.english: How many Baptists or Brethren does it take to change a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 更换一个灯泡要劳动多少个浸信会或者兄弟会基督徒？

sentences.english: But when they saw Griffith's predicament, they called the frat house instead.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到格里菲斯的困境后，联系了兄弟会。

sentences.english: All the guys in that fraternity are horny.
sentences.chinese: 那个兄弟会里的成员都是好色之徒。

sentences.english: I can't really say much because the fraternity has helped me so much with that.
sentences.chinese: 我讲不出来多少，因为在这方面兄弟会对我帮助很大。

sentences.english: The Jedi Army of Light and the Sith Brotherhood of Darkness clashed on the planet Ruusan.
sentences.chinese: 绝地光明军和西斯黑暗兄弟会在鲁桑星球交战。

sentences.english: Ralf sometimes wouldn't mind, if rather Takuma Sato was his brother instead…
sentences.chinese: 有时候，拉尔夫不介意佐藤是他兄弟会更好一点。

sentences.english: The fraternities on campus are a bunch of guys, they make you pay.
sentences.chinese: 学校的兄弟会是一群男学生组成的，他们会要你交钱。

sentences.english: and I don't know if you guys know what fraternities and sororities are.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚你们知不知道兄弟会和姐妹群是什么。

sentences.english: What would his mother and his brothers say?
sentences.chinese: 他的母亲和兄弟会说什么呢？

sentences.english: A couple of my friends are in fraternities and sororities.
sentences.chinese: 我有些朋友参加了兄弟会和姐妹会。

sentences.english: I know BHO helped The Muslim Brotherhood to become the largest political party in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 我知道奥巴马帮助穆斯林兄弟会成为埃及最大的政党。

sentences.english: It was sort of like a fraternity that worked very hard.
sentences.chinese: 有点像个兄弟会，在一起拼命工作。

sentences.english: Fraternities and med schools and other organizations haze people.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟会，医学院和其实会欺负新人的机构。

sentences.english: The investigation began after a student overdosed at a fraternity house.
sentences.chinese: 这项调查是在一名学生在兄弟会吸毒过度之后开始的。

sentences.english: But if the brotherhood is not seeking political power, what is its purpose?
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果兄弟会不求政治权力，它到底图什么？

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
